title: Perplexity AI Validation: Token Economics & Session Longevity Optimization

hypothesis_2_request_patterns.finding: Request frequency and pacing trigger infrastructure throttling

directive_engineering_formula.formula: Session Longevity = f(Token Optimization, Request Frequency Optimization, Natural API Load Pacing)
